column7: oh. donna was born on april 15
column9: oh to thurman wheeler of ky and alice (holmes) wheeler-strawser of oh. she is survived by her loving husband
column10: william vawters of 62 years; and her brothers
column11: tom and mike strawser. also survived and lovingly remembered by her daughters
column24: dublin oh; 14 grandchildren and 19 great-grandchildren; and several nephews and nieces and many friends. donna made many friends during her career at shoe corporation of america
column25: the state of ohio and sears where she retired in 1996. she was a member of highland baptist church in grove city. she also enjoyed meeting with her red hat society ladies. above all her faith and family were the most important things in her life. visitation will be on monday
column26: june 22 from 2-4 and 6-8 p. m. at newcomer funeral home
column30: oh. funeral service will be held on tuesday
column31: june 23 at 10 a. m. at the funeral home
column32: followed by burial service at wesley chapel cemetery
